name: css-text-underline
description: Css module of single purpose classes for text underline

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-text-underline.css > css/css-text-underline.css && tachyons src/css-text-underline.css --minify > css/css-text-underline.min.css && tachyons src/css-text-underline.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
